comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Moritz von Bissing (1844-1917) Appointed Governor-General of Belgium by the Germans in November, 1914, when he was almost 70, after a long miltary career. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moritz_von_Bissing de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moritz_von_Bissing

comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: Took over Belgian duties of Field Marshal Baron von der Goltz who was sent to Turkey.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to you both for this additional information.  We'll add some of it to the caption the next time we update.
